itunes:title: Episode 714 - The Election Hangover Show With Special Guest Nick Di Paolo
title: Episode 714 - The Election Hangover Show With Special Guest Nick Di Paolo
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome comedian and radio legend Nick Di Paolo as they discuss the election results, the state of the nation as a whole, what the Boston Comedy scene was like in the 80's, what Patrice O'Neal was really like in real life,...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome comedian and radio legend Nick Di Paolo as they discuss the election results, the state of the nation as a whole, what the Boston Comedy scene was like in the 80's, what Patrice O'Neal was really like in real life, his time on the Howard Stern Show and David Letterman, as well his craziest Artie Lange stories from their radio days.
